---
apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cert-manager
    chart: cert-manager-0.2.2
    heritage: Tiller
    release: cert-manager
  name: cert-manager2
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cert-manager
        release: cert-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-controller:v0.2.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: cert-manager
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 32Mi
      - image: quay.io/jetstack/cert-manager-ingress-shim:v0.2.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: ingress-shim
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 32Mi
      serviceAccountName: cert-manager
